creditline: Lent by the Frederick R. Weisman Art Museum, University of Minnesota, Minneapolis
description: six sided covered box; body decoration divided into two bands, plain white lower and brown upper with 3 white horizontal bands which run into cover; plain white glazed top
dimension: H.4-3/16 x W.4-1/2 x D.4-1/4 in., overall
title: Covered Box
